about_the_game:
Intro

In a new alternate universe set in the early 20th century, follow Miyu, a young student, as she tries to live everyday life with her teddy bear and guide, 'Cotton'.


When Miyu's parents' reckless lifestyle causes financial harm and attracts dangerous attention, she and her loyal companion embark on a journey into the infernal realms to begin a new business venture.

Characteristics


  • Write Your Story: Make impactful choices to your journey as shopkeeper.

  • Profitable Dungeon Crawler: Explore fast-paced dungeon challenges to gain access to new useful resources for your shop.

  • Potion Crafting: Discover a new and exciting way to make potions.

  • Master the Art of Pricing: Strategically price your products to attract new customers and maximize profits.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Embark on a Magical Shopkeeper RPG! Make strategic choices and face various challenges as you establish your store in Flame Plaza. Craft any type of potion. Fight enemies and complete quests to find new resources. Get ready for twists, and discover new ways of profit.
